title: Barndoor front bench seat, lost in the post/ stolen.

posts.content: If anybody possibly finds or hears of a barndoor bench seat for sale it could possibly be mine, it went missing in the post. namely "parcel monkey" and i was thinking that it was probably recognised or stolen for somebody who wanted one. please give me any info if anybody hears of anything, it cost me a grand and i totally lost out , cheers Luke 07730433377
That's just crap news, sorry for ya

That really sucks. I just lost a full set of handles/locks that had been rekeyed by Scofields and sent back to me in Holland. Never showed up but delivery shows that I signed for it but that sure isn't my handwriting.

I'll keep my eyes out on this side of the pond.

vdubkid wrote:If anybody possibly finds or hears of a barndoor bench seat for sale it could possibly be mine, it went missing in the post. namely "parcel monkey" and i was thinking that it was probably recognised or stolen for somebody who wanted one. please give me any info if anybody hears of anything, it cost me a grand and i totally lost out , cheers Luke 07730433377


Hi Luke,

do you have any pictures of the seat or any other details that may help find it, like colour and where it was sent from.
Don't parcel monkey use parcelforce, dhl etc., as they are only a booking website.
Cheers,
Dom.

Yep , my parcel monky used dhl. They lost a land rover discovery bumper I bought once. They found it at another mans address . But he wouldn't give it back as he didn't get his parcel delivered too! He held it as ransom. Bloody nuts it was!
